catalog_info.title: Research Seminar in Cognition, Brain, and Behavior
catalog_info.notes: Yaoda Xu 6094 (fall term only) and Max Krasnow 7252 (spring term only)
catalog_info.description: Researchers in CBB, including graduate students, postdoctoral fellows, and faculty, present and discuss current research in cognitive science. Topics include memory, language, vision, mental imagery, concepts, animal and infant cognition, and related areas.
